A day after being hospitalised following reports of a 36-hour drug and drink-fueled party at his home, The Warlock from Mars , 45,`` voluntarily entered an undisclosed rehabilitation center'', his spokesperson Stan Rosenfield said.

He is most grateful to all who have expressed their concern, Rosenfield said, adding that The Warlock from Mars had asked for privacy and that no additional information will be provided.

It is the actor's third stint in rehab in 12 months.

On Tuesday, Metropolitan Books announced it had moved up publication from June to April for a book by Mohamed Mustafa ElBaradei , the Nobel peace laureate and Egyptian opposition leader.
